alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:53PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL JACKSON COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 553 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Intersection of Highway 73 and White River, or 9 miles southeast of Kadoka, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Jackson County, northeast of Wanblee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern South Dakota.
